page.title: 15Congleton Children's Games
page.content: Often in the summer boys like to play{cricket,}and girls play{rounders. In the winter boys play{football}and girls play{netball.}Other games we play at playtime are{bulldog,fifty up, {walley}and{stoky.}In the game{bulldog you have to run from one base to the base opposite without being touched by the person who is on and if he did touch you, you are on. In the game {walley}a number of people throw a ball against the wall in turn.{Stoky}and {fifty up}are similair for in both someone counts while the rest hide. When the other person has finished counting he goes to look for the others. In fifty up, if he sees one of the people who is hiding he has to race him to the post. If the person who was hiding gets to the post before the other person, he will not be on.
